get.summary: Labels returns the set of label names against a given matching string and time frame

parameters.name: match
parameters.description: match are the set of matching strings

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: start is the start of the time window to perform the query

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: end is the end of the time window to perform the query

get.summary: Values returns the set of values that match a given label and time frame

parameters.name: labelName
parameters.description: label_name is the label name to match values against

parameters.name: match
parameters.description: match are the set of matching strings to match values against

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: start is the start of the time window to perform the query

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: end is the end of the time window to perform the query

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description:
mode indicates the type of query performed

 - MODE_SINGLE_UNSPECIFIED: MODE_SINGLE_UNSPECIFIED query unspecified
 - MODE_DIFF: MODE_DIFF is a diff query
 - MODE_MERGE: MODE_MERGE is a merge query

parameters.name: diff.a.mode
parameters.description:
mode is the selection of the diff mode

 - MODE_SINGLE_UNSPECIFIED: MODE_SINGLE_UNSPECIFIED default unspecified
 - MODE_MERGE: MODE_MERGE merge profile

parameters.name: diff.a.merge.query
parameters.description: query is the query string to match profiles for merge

parameters.name: diff.a.merge.start
parameters.description: start is the beginning of the evaluation time window

parameters.name: diff.a.merge.end
parameters.description: end is the end of the evaluation time window

parameters.name: diff.a.single.time
parameters.description: time is the point in time to perform the profile request

parameters.name: diff.a.single.query
parameters.description: query is the query string to retrieve the profile

parameters.name: diff.b.mode
parameters.description:
mode is the selection of the diff mode

 - MODE_SINGLE_UNSPECIFIED: MODE_SINGLE_UNSPECIFIED default unspecified
 - MODE_MERGE: MODE_MERGE merge profile

parameters.name: diff.b.merge.query
parameters.description: query is the query string to match profiles for merge

parameters.name: diff.b.merge.start
parameters.description: start is the beginning of the evaluation time window

parameters.name: diff.b.merge.end
parameters.description: end is the end of the evaluation time window

parameters.name: diff.b.single.time
parameters.description: time is the point in time to perform the profile request

parameters.name: diff.b.single.query
parameters.description: query is the query string to retrieve the profile

parameters.name: merge.query
parameters.description: query is the query string to match profiles for merge

parameters.name: merge.start
parameters.description: start is the beginning of the evaluation time window

parameters.name: merge.end
parameters.description: end is the end of the evaluation time window

parameters.name: single.time
parameters.description: time is the point in time to perform the profile request

parameters.name: single.query
parameters.description: query is the query string to retrieve the profile

parameters.name: reportType
parameters.description:
report_type is the type of report to return

 - REPORT_TYPE_FLAMEGRAPH_UNSPECIFIED: REPORT_TYPE_FLAMEGRAPH_UNSPECIFIED unspecified
 - REPORT_TYPE_PPROF: REPORT_TYPE_PPROF unspecified
 - REPORT_TYPE_TOP: REPORT_TYPE_TOP unspecified
 - REPORT_TYPE_CALLGRAPH: REPORT_TYPE_CALLGRAPH unspecified
 - REPORT_TYPE_FLAMEGRAPH_TABLE: REPORT_TYPE_FLAMEGRAPH_TABLE unspecified
 - REPORT_TYPE_FLAMEGRAPH_ARROW: REPORT_TYPE_FLAMEGRAPH_ARROW unspecified

parameters.name: filterQuery
parameters.description: filter_query is the query string to filter the profile samples

parameters.name: nodeTrimThreshold
parameters.description: node_trim_threshold is the threshold % where the nodes with Value less than this will be removed from the report

get.summary: QueryRange performs a profile query over a time range

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: query is the query string to match profiles against

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: start is the start of the query time window

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: end is the end of the query time window

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit is the max number of profiles to include in the response

parameters.name: step
parameters.description: step is the duration of each sample returned.

parameters.name: match
parameters.description: match ...

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: start ...

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: end ...

post.summary: ShareProfile uploads the given profile to pprof.me and returns a link to the profile.

get.summary: ProfileTypes returns the list of available profile types.

QueryRequestReportType.description:
- REPORT_TYPE_FLAMEGRAPH_UNSPECIFIED: REPORT_TYPE_FLAMEGRAPH_UNSPECIFIED unspecified
 - REPORT_TYPE_PPROF: REPORT_TYPE_PPROF unspecified
 - REPORT_TYPE_TOP: REPORT_TYPE_TOP unspecified
 - REPORT_TYPE_CALLGRAPH: REPORT_TYPE_CALLGRAPH unspecified
 - REPORT_TYPE_FLAMEGRAPH_TABLE: REPORT_TYPE_FLAMEGRAPH_TABLE unspecified
 - REPORT_TYPE_FLAMEGRAPH_ARROW: REPORT_TYPE_FLAMEGRAPH_ARROW unspecified
QueryRequestReportType.title: ReportType is the type of report to return

id.description: id is the unique identifier for the function.

startLine.description: start_line is the line number in the source file of the first line of the function.

name.description: name is the name of the function.

systemName.description:
system_name describes the name of the function, as identified by the
system. For instance, it can be a C++ mangled name.

filename.description: filename is the name of the source file of the function.

nameStringIndex.description: name_string_index is the index in the string table to the name associated with the function.

systemNameStringIndex.description: system_name_string_index is the index in the string table to the system_name associated with the function.

filenameStringIndex.description: filename_string_index is the index in the string table to the filename associated with the function.

metastorev1alpha1Function.description: Function describes metadata of a source code function.

functionId.description: function_id is the ID of the function.

line.description: line is the line number in the source file of the referenced function.

functionIndex.description: function_index is the index in the functions table.

metastorev1alpha1Line.description: Line describes a source code function and its line number.

id.description: id is the unique identifier for the location.

address.description: address is the memory address of the location if present.

mappingId.description: mapping_id is the unique identifier for the mapping associated with the location.

isFolded.description: is_folded indicates whether the location is folded into the previous location.

lines.description:
lines are the call frames represented by this location. Multiple lines
indicate they have been inlined.

mappingIndex.description: mapping_index has the index into the mapping table where mappings are sent deduplicated.

metastorev1alpha1Location.description: Location describes a single location of a stack traces.

id.description: id is the unique identifier for the mapping.

start.description: start is the start address of the mapping.

limit.description: limit is the length of the address space of the mapping.

offset.description: offset in the binary that corresponds to the first mapped address.

file.description: file is the name of the file associated with the mapping.

buildId.description: build_id is the build ID of the mapping.

hasFunctions.description: has_functions indicates whether the mapping has associated functions.

hasFilenames.description: has_filenames indicates whether the mapping has associated filenames.

hasLineNumbers.description: has_line_numbers indicates whether the mapping has associated line numbers.

hasInlineFrames.description: has_inline_frames indicates whether the mapping has associated inline frames.

fileStringIndex.description: fileStringIndex is the index in the string table to the file name associated with the mapping.

buildIdStringIndex.description: build_id_string_index is the index in the string table to the build ID of the mapping.

types.description: types is the list of available profile types.

parcaqueryv1alpha1ProfileTypesResponse.description: ProfileTypesResponse is the response to retrieve the list of available profile types.

mode.title: mode indicates the type of query performed

diff.title: diff contains the diff query options

merge.title: merge contains the merge query options

single.title: single contains the single query options

reportType.title: report_type is the type of report to return

filterQuery.title: filter_query is the query string to filter the profile samples

nodeTrimThreshold.title: node_trim_threshold is the threshold % where the nodes with Value less than this will be removed from the report

parcaqueryv1alpha1QueryRequest.title: QueryRequest is a request for a profile query

flamegraph.title: flamegraph is a flamegraph representation of the report

pprof.title: pprof is a pprof profile as compressed bytes

top.title: top is a top list representation of the report

callgraph.title: callgraph is a callgraph nodes and edges representation of the report

flamegraphArrow.title: flamegraph_arrow is a flamegraph encoded as a arrow record

total.description: total is the total number of samples shown in the report.

filtered.description: filtered is the number of samples filtered out of the report.

parcaqueryv1alpha1QueryResponse.title: QueryResponse is the returned report for the given query

value.title: value is the value for the label name

profilestorev1alpha1Label.title: Label is a key value pair of identifiers

type.title: type is the type of the value

unit.title: unit is the unit of the value

queryv1alpha1ValueType.title: ValueType represents a value, including its type and unit

nodes.title: nodes are the nodes in the callgraph

edges.title: edges are the edges connecting nodes in the callgraph

cumulative.description:
cumulative is the total cumulative value of the callgraph
Use total from the top level query response instead.

v1alpha1Callgraph.title: Callgraph is the callgraph report type

id.title: id is the unique id of the edge

source.title: source represents the id of the source node

target.title: target represents the id of the target node

cumulative.title: cumulative is the cumulative value of the edge

isCollapsed.title: is_collapsed indicates if the edge is collapsed

v1alpha1CallgraphEdge.title: CallgraphEdge represents an edge in the graph

id.title: id is the unique id of the node

meta.title: meta is the metadata about the node

cumulative.title: cumulative is the cumulative value of the node

flat.title: flat is the flat value of the node

v1alpha1CallgraphNode.title: CallgraphNode represents a node in the graph

location.title: location is the location for the code

mapping.title: mapping is the mapping into code

v1alpha1CallgraphNodeMeta.title: TopNodeMeta is the metadata for a given node

a.title: a is the first profile to diff

b.title: b is the second profile to diff

v1alpha1DiffProfile.title: DiffProfile contains parameters for a profile diff request

root.title: root is the root of the flame graph

total.description:
total is the total weight of the flame graph
Use total from the top level query response instead.

unit.title: unit is the unit represented by the flame graph

height.title: height is the max height of the graph

stringTable.description: string_table holds all deduplicated strings used in the meta data.

locations.description: locations deduplicated by their ID to be referenced by nodes.

mapping.description: mapping deduplicated by their ID to be referenced by nodes.

function.description: function deduplicated by their ID to be referenced by nodes.

untrimmedTotal.description:
untrimmed_total is the total weight of the flame graph before trimming.
Use trimmed instead.

trimmed.description: trimmed is the amount of cumulative value trimmed from the flame graph.

v1alpha1Flamegraph.title: Flamegraph is the flame graph report type

record.title: record is the arrow record containing the actual flamegraph data

unit.title: unit is the unit represented by the flame graph

height.title: height is the max height of the graph

trimmed.description: trimmed is the amount of cumulative value trimmed from the flame graph.

v1alpha1FlamegraphArrow.title: Flamegraph is the flame graph report type

meta.title: meta is the metadata about the node

cumulative.title: cumulative is the cumulative value of the node

v1alpha1FlamegraphNode.title: FlamegraphNode represents a node in the graph

location.title: location is the location for the code

mapping.title: mapping is the mapping into code

locationIndex.description: location_index has the index to the deduplicated location in the location table.

lineIndex.description: line_index is the line index within the referenced location.

v1alpha1FlamegraphNodeMeta.title: FlamegraphNodeMeta is the metadata for a given node

cumulative.title: cumulative is the cumulative value of the graph

children.title: children are the list of the children of the root node

v1alpha1FlamegraphRootNode.title: FlamegraphRootNode is a root node of a flame graph

labels.title: labels are the grouping of labels

v1alpha1LabelSet.title: LabelSet is a group of labels

labelNames.title: / label_names are the set of matching label names

v1alpha1LabelsResponse.title: LabelsResponse is the set of matching label names

query.title: query is the query string to match profiles for merge

start.title: start is the beginning of the evaluation time window

end.title: end is the end of the evaluation time window

v1alpha1MergeProfile.title: MergeProfile contains parameters for a merge request

timestamp.title: timestamp is the time the profile was ingested

value.title: value is the cumulative value for the profile

valuePerSecond.title: value_per_second is the calculated per second average in the steps duration

duration.description: duration is the normalized aggregated duration the metric samples has been observed over.

v1alpha1MetricsSample.title: MetricsSample is a cumulative value and timestamp of a profile

labelset.title: labelset is the set of key value pairs

samples.title: samples is the set of top-level cumulative values of the corresponding profiles

periodType.title: period_type is the value type of profile period

sampleType.title: sample_type is the value type of profile sample

v1alpha1MetricsSeries.title: MetricsSeries is a set of labels and corresponding sample values

mode.title: mode is the selection of the diff mode

merge.title: merge contains options for a merge request

single.title: single contains options for a single profile request

v1alpha1ProfileDiffSelection.title: ProfileDiffSelection contains the parameters of a diff selection

v1alpha1ProfileDiffSelectionMode.description:
- MODE_SINGLE_UNSPECIFIED: MODE_SINGLE_UNSPECIFIED default unspecified
 - MODE_MERGE: MODE_MERGE merge profile
v1alpha1ProfileDiffSelectionMode.title: Mode specifies the type of diff

name.description: name is the name of the profile type.

sampleType.description: sample_type is the type of the samples in the profile.

sampleUnit.description: sample_unit is the unit of the samples in the profile.

periodType.description: period_type is the type of the periods in the profile.

periodUnit.description: period_unit is the unit of the periods in the profile.

delta.description: delta describes whether the profile is a delta profile.

v1alpha1ProfileType.description: ProfileType is the type of a profile as well as the units the profile type is available in.

series.title: series is the set of metrics series that satisfy the query range request

v1alpha1QueryRangeResponse.title: QueryRangeResponse is the set of matching profile values

v1alpha1QueryRequestMode.description:
- MODE_SINGLE_UNSPECIFIED: MODE_SINGLE_UNSPECIFIED query unspecified
 - MODE_DIFF: MODE_DIFF is a diff query
 - MODE_MERGE: MODE_MERGE is a merge query
v1alpha1QueryRequestMode.title: Mode is the type of query request

queryRequest.title: QueryRequest that refers to the profile to be shared

v1alpha1ShareProfileRequest.title: ShareProfileRequest represents the query denoting the profile and a description about the profile

v1alpha1ShareProfileResponse.title: ShareProfileResponse represents the shared link of a profile

time.title: time is the point in time to perform the profile request

query.title: query is the query string to retrieve the profile

v1alpha1SingleProfile.title: SingleProfile contains parameters for a single profile query request

list.title: list are the list of ordered elements of the table

reported.title: reported is the number of lines reported

total.description:
total is the number of lines that exist in the report
Use total from the top level query response instead.

unit.title: unit is the unit represented by top table

v1alpha1Top.title: Top is the top report type

meta.title: meta is the metadata about the node

cumulative.title: cumulative is the cumulative value of the node

flat.title: flat is the flat value of the node

diff.title: diff is the diff value between two profiles

v1alpha1TopNode.title: TopNode is a node entry in a top list

location.title: location is the location for the code

mapping.title: mapping is the mapping into code

v1alpha1TopNodeMeta.title: TopNodeMeta is the metadata for a given node

labelValues.title: label_values are the set of matching label values

v1alpha1ValuesResponse.title: ValuesResponse are the set of matching values
